mapper.sql: bussId, groupId, name, address, bussUser, bussPhone, createTime, updateTime, userId, parentId
mapper.update:
update live_buss_info
groupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bussUser = #{bussuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bussPhone = #{bussphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = now(),
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where bussId = #{bussid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into live_buss_info ( groupId, name, address, bussUser, bussPhone, createTime, updateTime, userId, parentId) values ( #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bussuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bussphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from live_buss_info
groupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
name like #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
bussUser = #{bussuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
bussPhone = #{bussphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from live_buss_info
name like #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
